name: Narokoh Run (Team Lamaz)
description:
/!\ Watch this gif.

It's a cinematic that will introduce you to the game.

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1cjTG_JySLs7U79Mgq6MwIuTqciOwA8tD/view?usp=shari...

Jump : SPACE

Slide : Down Arrow

Get Up : Up Arrow

Tip : Get instantly on the ground while jumping by pressing Down Arrow
